title: Book Jacket, "Bookjacket for "Keats" by John Middleton Murry", 1953
medium: Lithography in yellow and black ink on light grey wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on the cover page at the top center in script in black ink: lustig
On cover vertically from top to bottom on left side in yellow ink: Keats
On upper left side in black ink: Keats/ John Middleton Murry
At lower left in black ink: Noonday Press
Vertically down center (spine) in black ink: Keats John Middleton Murry Noonday
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: On the right side of the cover is a synopsis of the book's contents. On the back cover is a listing and brief description of books from the Noonday Press and the company address. Produced for the Noonday Press.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Jacket, "Bookjacket for "Keats" by John Middleton Murry", 1953.
1953. Lithography in yellow and black ink on light grey wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-167.
